00062             function                show_package_tree_rec( $Packages )
00063             {
00064                   try
00065                   {
00066                         if( isset( $Packages[ 0 ] ) == false )
00067                         {
00068                               return( '' );
00069                         }
00070                         
00071                         $Brunch = '<ul>';
00072                         
00073                         foreach( $Packages as $i => $Package )
00074                         {
00075                               $Title = $Package[ 'package_name' ].'.'.$Package[ 'package_version' ];
00076                               $Brunch .= "<li id=\"phtml_$Title\"><a href=\"#\"><ins>&nbsp;</ins>$Title</a>";
00077 
00078                               $Brunch .= $this->show_package_tree_rec( $Package[ 'subpackages' ] );
00079                               
00080                               $Brunch .= '</li>';
00081                         }
00082                         
00083                         return( "$Brunch</ul>" );
00084                   }
00085                   catch( Exception $e )
00086                   {
00087                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00088                   }
00089             }
00090       
00109             function                show_package_tree( $Options )
00110             {
00111                   try
00112                   {
00113                         $PackageAlgorithms = get_package( 'core::package_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00114                         $Packages = $PackageAlgorithms->get_packages_tree();
00115 
00116                         $this->Output = '<div class="tree_control"><ul class="ltr"><li id="phtml_system" class="open" '.
00117                                                       'rel="root"><a href="#"><ins>&nbsp</ins>/</a><ul>';
00118                         
00119                         foreach( $Packages as $i => $Package )
00120                         {
00121                               $Title = $Package[ 'package_name' ].'.'.$Package[ 'package_version' ];
00122                               
00123                               $this->Output .= "<li id=\"phtml_$Title\"><a href=\"#\"><ins>&nbsp;</ins>$Title</a>";
00124 
00125                               $this->Output .= $this->show_package_tree_rec( $Package[ 'subpackages' ] );
00126 
00127                               $this->Output .= '</li>';
00128                         }
00129                         
00130                         $this->Output .= '</ul></div>';
00131                   }
00132                   catch( Exception $e )
00133                   {
00134                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00135                   }
00136             }

00165                         {
00166                               return( '' );
00167                         }

00169                         $Brunch = '<ul><li id=\"phtml_dummy\"><a href=\"#\"><ins>&nbsp;</ins>{lang:meta}</a><ul>';
00170                         
00171                         foreach( $MetaFiles as $i => $File )
00172                         {
00173                               $Title = basename( $File );
00174                               
00175                               $Brunch .= "<li id=\"phtml_$Title\" class=\"meta\"><a href=\"#\"><ins>&nbsp;</ins>$Title</a></li>";
00176                         }
00177

00361             function                view( $Options )
00362             {
00363                   try
00364                   {                       
00365                         $Context = get_package( 'gui::context' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00366                         
00367                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_show_package_tree' );
00368                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return( $this->Output );
00369                         
00370                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_show_system_tree' );
00371                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return( $this->Output );
00372                   }
00373                   catch( Exception $e )
00374                   {
00375                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00376                   }
00377             }
